kariminf.as.preProcess

Class StaticPreProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • kariminf.as.preProcess.StaticPreProcessor

  • public class StaticPreProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Preprocess task

    Given a text in a certain language, this class is used to look for adequate methods to preprocess it.

    PreProcessing consists of normalization (See Normalizer), sentences and word segmentation (See Segmenter), stemming (See Stemmer) and stop words removing (See SWEliminator).

      • PreProcess

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> PreProcess(java.util.List<java.lang.String> Sents)
        Preprocess a list of sentences; here the sentence segmentation task is not used
        Parameters:
        Sents - list of sentences
        Returns:
        list of sentences where each sentence is a list of preprocessed words

      • preProcess

        public void preProcess(java.lang.String inTxt)
        Preprocess a given text
        Parameters:
        inTxt - text to be preprocessed; the result can be found in the Data object given in the constructor (See StaticPreProcessor#PreProcessor(String, Data)
